scripts.build: npm run clean && echo Using TypeScript && npx tsc --version && npx tsc --build && npx tsc-alias
scripts.major-release: npm run build:add && git commit -m '[major-release]' && git push --force-with-lease && npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push
scripts.minor-release: npm run build:add && git commit -m '[minor-release]' && git push --force-with-lease && npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push
scripts.patch-release: npm run build:add && git commit -m '[patch-release]' && git push --force-with-lease && npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push
